message.body: What happened to you?
Not this again.
You're reading too much into things and/or are paranoid
Yeah. Paranoid. Lets go with that
Sounds good to me.
And I do get it
Well, how was I supposed to know? You were addressing something completely different.
Yeah sure. It would be great to skip all the nonsense. But you could say that about anything
So?
What's your point?
When did you go from being a realist to an idealist?
I'm not
I said "Wouldn't it be great if"
Wouldn't it b great if...
Everything was perfect and nothing ever hurt
Again, what's your point, dude.
That doesn't make me an idealist.
Its notnmy point, its yours
And typing on a phone sucks
No, you are asserting that I've somehow morphed into an idealist.
Please deliver unto me your proof.
Well, you made an idealist statement
No, I didn't.
I expressed an idealist sentiment.
From the perspective that IT IS COMPLETELY IMPLAUSIBLE.
Well, not completely

My new theory is that you've realized that being completely nonsensical and asserting that I've undergone some massive personality change is the best possible way to aggravate me, and that's why you persist in doing so.
I'm always nonsensical. I believe that if my motivation was to aggravate you, I could do a better job than that.
Regarding the idealist thing, I made a statement about how a particular "dream" was understandable. I never said that I wished it was that way.
It was more an expression of frustration at having to deal with baggage than a whimsical desire that things by different.
Sure its understandable, but in a naive, childish way
DUDE
What is *your* problem?
All I did was express frustration that shit was troublesome
I didn't ask for a fucking lecture on things I already fucking know
Seems you always end up here
When I make assertions that youve changed, its in reference to the fact that we used to talk, and now we don't. It.just results in you being angry with me

Maybe because it's the same problem every time: you decide you need to educate or enlighten me on some topic because you've ascertained through some sort of shitty detective work that I'm ignorant of it.
So I've changed in some way?
Maybe it's a combination of things
